name: geographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to geography (= the study of places, especially their physical position and features), or to the geography of a particular area or place: Venezuela has the advantage of being geographically close to the United States. These services must be available to all women, with special provision made for geographically remote locations. See
geographic
More examplesFewer examplesThe schools were isolated geographically.The National Cancer Institute for a number of years has been plotting cancer trends geographically.The Lake Forest district is geographically one of the largest in the county.
